name: MONO--death
description:
WINDOWS VERSION HIGHLY RECOMMEDED.

---------------------------

Die while the game will try to stop you.

Made for the Black & White Jam 9 (Death is a new beginning).

Make sure the game is in full screen mode if you want to play in the browser.

Ran out of time for the title.

---------------------------

A and D or arrow keys - Left and right.

W, Up arrow, or space - Jump

P - Reset Progress

R - Restart Level

Esc - Exit to main menu

---------------------------

Enjoy :)
